settings.label: Basic Settings
settings.comment: You can read more about Paynova API on: docs.paynova.com/display/API/

sales_channel.label: Sales Channel
sales_channel.comment: Your reference for the sales channel through which the customer is purchasing goods/services.

sales_location_id.label: Sales Location Id
sales_location_id.comment: Your identifier for the sales location. This might be a website URL, a country, a call-center location, etc.

autofinalize_email.label: Send e-mail after auto order Finalization
